Hi all. I started recruiting yesterday for an online play-by-post Dungeon World campaign. It&#39;s going to be hosted on Paizo.com, which is the website for Paizo, the parent company of Pathfinder; but they don&#39;t mind letting Dungeon World players use their forums too. I like their forum system because it has a nice die roller and fantasy avatars in their database, and it&#39;s all free to make an account for and use. Players will be posting an update once or twice a day and the campaign goes on like that. <br /><br />Anyway, the party will be comprised of races from the Number Appearing Dungeon World supplement, which I provide a link for in my recruitment post. This means the party will be made up of monstrous races such as orcs, minotaurs, and kobolds. The campaign is a revenge story against a high-level adventuring party that destroyed your tribe and took your loot. <br /><br />I have a few people that have expressed interest but not a full party yet. If you&#39;re interested, check out my recruitment post! <br /><br />Thanks, <br />Matt<br /><br />


Attachment:

<a href='http://paizo.com/threads/rzs2uorx?-Monstrous-Races-campaign-Revenge-on-the#1'>- Recruitment: (Dungeon World) Monstrous Races campaign - Revenge on the Adventurers</a>
